channel.title: How to get on the Registry Editor, at school ;) [And Explorer, ETC.]
channel.description:
[b][u]Introduction:[/u][/b] Bored? Have a near by school computer? And just feel like,.....Messing around? Well I have something to solve that.
[b][u]Things needed:[/u][/b] Access to a computer [Obviously]. Xoblite BlackBox for windows.. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,233466.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,233466.0.html[/url] And, common sense.
[b][u]Step One:[/u][/b] So, You downloaded Xoblite [[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,233466.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,233466.0.html[/url]], And extracted it to a folder on you're desktop, correct?
You should see this.. [URL=http://img252.imageshack.us/my.php?image=xtuthw1.png][IMG]http://img252.imageshack.us/img252/4818/xtuthw1.th.png[/img][/URL], right? If so GREAT! [Remember, You can also download Xoblite from [url=http://www.xoblite.net]www.xoblite.net[/url] if you can't access MITB forums, [like me]. And if you can't, try some proxies.]
[b][u]Step Two:[/u][/b] Now that we have Xoblite, Run.. "Blackbox.exe". This is the feature for you can use Xoblite with out installing it as a shell. And also, on some computers, you can run it with out administrator rights, [unlike the install feature].
[u][b]Step Three:[/b][/u] Xoblite, changed you're desktop correct? You now have a new theme. ;D! Now it gets easy.
Right-Click anywhere on you're desktop...
And follow this... [URL=http://img147.imageshack.us/my.php?image=xtut2ul8.png][IMG]http://img147.imageshack.us/img147/6379/xtut2ul8.th.png[/img][/URL],
Congratulations! You now are on the Registry Editor, at school.
[b][u]Final Note:[/u][/b] Big deal Divine, Whats the use? Well, That's for you to decide. YOU think of what to do. Plus, I'm NOT responsible for what happens, Thanks and Enjoy.

item.title: How to get on the Registry Editor, at school ;) [And Explorer, ETC.]
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

Doesn’t this work?
Create a file called Nub.bat with this in it:

regedit

Read full topic

item.title: How to get on the Registry Editor, at school ;) [And Explorer, ETC.]
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

Introduction:
Bored? Have a near by school computer? And just feel like,…Messing around? Well I have something to solve that.

Things needed:
Access to a computer [Obviously].
Xoblite BlackBox for windows… http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,233466.0.html
And, common sense.

Step One:
So, You downloaded Xoblite [http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,233466.0.html], And extracted it to a folder on you’re desktop, correct?

You should see this…
,
right? If so GREAT! [Remember, You can also download Xoblite from www.xoblite.net if you can’t access MITB forums, [like me]. And if you can’t, try some proxies.]

Step Two:
Now that we have Xoblite, Run… “Blackbox.exe”. This is the feature for you can use Xoblite with out installing it as a shell. And also, on some computers, you can run it with out administrator rights, [unlike the install feature].

Step Three:
Xoblite, changed you’re desktop correct? You now have a new theme. ;D!
Now it gets easy.

Right-Click anywhere on you’re desktop…

And follow this…
,

Congratulations! You now are on the Registry Editor, at school.

Final Note:
Big deal Divine, Whats the use? Well, That’s for you to decide. YOU think of what to do.
Plus,
I’m NOT responsible for what happens, Thanks and Enjoy.

Read full topic
item.source: How to get on the Registry Editor, at school ;) [And Explorer, ETC.]
